channel.title: Boss attack problem
channel.description: Downloaded Orical X's source and like most people who downloaded it have seen it has bugs, But theres one bug on it that i cant seem to fix, everytime i attack some monsters (usually the boss monsters like corp, kbd and others) my character runs in the oposite direction, nocliping threw walls and other objects. can someone tell me how to fix? also it has a problem with the drops can someone help me or share some scripts to how to fix

item.title: Boss attack problem
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Hello,

This would be a server issue not a client issue.

Try posting this in the “Server Help” section.

Here is a link for you: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,48.0.html

Thank you, and best of luck.

Read full topic
